events.name: Three-period EV battery closed-loop supply chain
events.wd_label: Three-period EV battery closed-loop supply chain
events.wd_description: This event explores a three-period electric vehicle (EV) battery recycle and reuse closed-loop supply chain (CLSC) involving a battery manufacturer and a remanufacturer. It focuses on optimizing total profits through optimal pricing strategies and analyzing relationships between various parameters.
events.description: This event explores a three-period electric vehicle (EV) battery recycle and reuse closed-loop supply chain (CLSC) involving a battery manufacturer and a remanufacturer. It focuses on optimizing total profits through optimal pricing strategies and analyzing relationships between various parameters.

events.name: Three-period model
events.wd_description: Proposing a three-period EV battery closed-loop supply chain model that describes the return, reuse, and recycle remanufacturing process.
events.description: Proposing a three-period EV battery closed-loop supply chain model that describes the return, reuse, and recycle remanufacturing process.

events.name: iod 1
events.wd_description: In period 1, all batteries are made from raw materials and are used in EVs until their capacity falls to 70% ~ 80%.
events.description: In period 1, all batteries are made from raw materials and are used in EVs until their capacity falls to 70% ~ 80%.

events.name: iod 2
events.wd_description: In period 2, used batteries are returned and sorted into high-quality and low-quality batteries, with some selected for reuse.
events.description: In period 2, used batteries are returned and sorted into high-quality and low-quality batteries, with some selected for reuse.

events.name: iod 3
events.wd_description: In period 3, after reusing, used batteries are recycled, completing the closed-loop supply chain.
events.description: In period 3, after reusing, used batteries are recycled, completing the closed-loop supply chain.

events.name: Optimal pricing strategy
events.wd_description: Developing the optimal pricing strategy between the manufacturer and remanufacturer to optimize total profits across different periods.
events.description: Developing the optimal pricing strategy between the manufacturer and remanufacturer to optimize total profits across different periods.

events.name: h equilibrium
events.wd_description: Deriving the Nash equilibrium between manufacturers and remanufacturers in period 2 and period 3.
events.description: Deriving the Nash equilibrium between manufacturers and remanufacturers in period 2 and period 3.

events.name: imal quantities
events.wd_description: Determining the optimal (re)manufacturing quantities to maximize profits.
events.description: Determining the optimal (re)manufacturing quantities to maximize profits.

events.name: uisition prices
events.wd_description: Setting the optimal acquisition prices for used batteries to balance supply and demand.
events.description: Setting the optimal acquisition prices for used batteries to balance supply and demand.

events.name: Parameter relationships
events.wd_description: Analyzing the relationships between return yield, sorting rate, recycling rate, and other parameters to optimize total profit in different periods.
events.description: Analyzing the relationships between return yield, sorting rate, recycling rate, and other parameters to optimize total profit in different periods.

events.name: urn yield
events.wd_description: Examining the impact of the return yield of used batteries on the closed-loop supply chain.
events.description: Examining the impact of the return yield of used batteries on the closed-loop supply chain.

events.name: ting rate
events.wd_description: Analyzing the sorting rate of used batteries and its linear relationship with optimal profit.
events.description: Analyzing the sorting rate of used batteries and its linear relationship with optimal profit.

events.name: ycling rate
events.wd_description: Investigating the recycling rate of used batteries and its effect on the supply chain’s profitability.
events.description: Investigating the recycling rate of used batteries and its effect on the supply chain’s profitability.

events.name: ufacturing costs
events.wd_description: Evaluating the manufacturing costs and their influence on the total optimal profit in both periods 2 and 3.
events.description: Evaluating the manufacturing costs and their influence on the total optimal profit in both periods 2 and 3.

events.name: Summary of findings
events.wd_description: Summarizing the key findings and their implications for EV battery manufacturers and remanufacturers.
events.description: Summarizing the key findings and their implications for EV battery manufacturers and remanufacturers.

events.name: ear relationship of sorting rate
events.wd_description: Finding that the sorting rate has a linear relationship with optimal profit, simplifying supply chain analysis.
events.description: Finding that the sorting rate has a linear relationship with optimal profit, simplifying supply chain analysis.

events.name: act of return batteries
events.wd_description: Discovering that more return batteries lead to less profit, explaining why recycling is not widely accepted by manufacturers.
events.description: Discovering that more return batteries lead to less profit, explaining why recycling is not widely accepted by manufacturers.

events.name: sable batteries profit
events.wd_description: Concluding that more reusable batteries increase profit in period 2, encouraging careful battery use by customers.
events.description: Concluding that more reusable batteries increase profit in period 2, encouraging careful battery use by customers.

events.name: ycling rate efficiency
events.wd_description: Finding that a higher recycling rate and lower recycling processing cost lead to higher profit, emphasizing the need for efficiency and technological innovation in recycling operations.
events.description: Finding that a higher recycling rate and lower recycling processing cost lead to higher profit, emphasizing the need for efficiency and technological innovation in recycling operations.

events.name: ernment incentives
events.wd_description: Suggesting that government incentives are necessary to increase the economic benefits of recycling and sustain the recycling business.
events.description: Suggesting that government incentives are necessary to increase the economic benefits of recycling and sustain the recycling business.

events.name: Special characteristics of EV battery CLSC
events.wd_label: Special characteristics of EV battery CLSC
events.wd_description: Highlighting the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain model and its implications for manufacturers and remanufacturers.
events.description: Highlighting the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain model and its implications for manufacturers and remanufacturers.

events.name: que characteristics
events.wd_description: Identifying the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain, such as the ability to reuse batteries before recycling.
events.description: Identifying the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain, such as the ability to reuse batteries before recycling.

events.name: lications for manufacturers
events.wd_description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery manufacturers, including strategies for optimizing profit.
events.description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery manufacturers, including strategies for optimizing profit.

events.name: lications for remanufacturers
events.wd_description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery remanufacturers, including strategies for maximizing reuse and recycling efficiency.
events.description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery remanufacturers, including strategies for maximizing reuse and recycling efficiency.
